title: Happy Thanksgiving
content: :: TG 2010 (CIO, CTO depicted, photos by CMO) ::We're closing shop for a few days.I've got some [business meeting notes](http://groups.yahoo.com/group/synergeo/message/63670) tacked on to the end of this post to Synergeo, in case you're looking for more CSN history.Welcome back Nirel.  I'm pleased they're planning to make that movie of your adventures.I'll be staying with our CIO and his family unless the roads are impassable.
author: Kirby Urner
